title: A Characterization of the Australian Financial Assistance Grants System
text:
Preface
This is a Quarto book.
To learn more about Quarto books visit https://quarto.org/docs/books.

title: 1  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.




Knuth, Donald E. 1984. “Literate Programming.” Comput. J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.

title: 2  FA Grant Allocation Methodology
text:
2.1 At the Federal Level
30% of the General Purpose Component grant is allocated on a per capita basis.
General Purpose Component - Allocation to states on a per capital basis Roads Component - Allocation to states based on fixed ratios:

title: 2  FA Grant Allocation Methodology
text:
State
Roads Component %




New South Wales
29.0%


Victoria
20.6%


Queensland
18.7%


South Australia
5.5%


Western Australia
15.3%


Tasmania
5.3%


Northern Territory
2.3%


Australian Capital Territory
3.2%




NSW, WA, SA : Population > 50,000 -> Minimum grant council
